## Source: amazon-inspector (f087523af82d7438462bdf269292570db2114097ae1ee24979225379641e15f6)
The package linkedin-ui was found to contain malicious code.

## Source: ossf-package-analysis (7b7cf3f9446902768fdacfea94b405316c62ff499baec342efc1a7a133084d90)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'linkedin-ui' @ 85.8.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
